title: Men Pay, Animals Slay
itunes:title: Men Pay, Animals Slay
description:
The Breakfast Club gets into a passionate discussion about how important money is in a relationship and whether or not women put too much emphasis on how much a man spends on her. Then Charlamagne does his best Diego-impersonation as he defends a pack of lions that were arrested. Yes, they were ARRESTED and imprisoned. Or is that just the definition of a zoo? Let's discuss.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
